title: Vtopmart 8 Pack Glass Meal Prep Containers with Leak Proof Locking Lids, Airtight Food Storage Containers for Microwave, Oven, Freezer and Dishwasher, BPA Free, Grey
raw_desc: 【Set of 8 Glass Storage Containers】Rectangle (35.1OZ)+(21.6OZ)+(12.5OZ)+(5OZ); Square (27.1OZ)+(17.6OZ)+(10.8OZ)+(6.8OZ); large and small containers are versatile for different use: meal prep food, leftover, sauce, lunch to go, RV, picnic, camping. 【Glass Containers Safe for Oven/ Microwave/ Freezer/ Dishwasher】Vtopmart Meal Prep Container is able to withstand -4℉ to 752℉ (-20℃ – 400℃), the glass containers is made of high-quality borosilicate glass to hold up very well from refrigerator direct to microwave. 【100% Leak Proof Airtight Lid】Glass food containers is designed with removable silicone seals and 4-hinge snap locks to ensure zero leaking or spilling, which also prevent smell go out and keep food fresh. 【BPA Free and Food Grade Material】The glass food containers is 100% BPA Free, crystal-clear glass making it easy to see what's inside. Stains-resistant material for easy cleaning and keep glass containers looks like new. 【Stackable Storage to Save Space】The durable food storage containers stack into each other for easier storing when you don’t use them, which fit neatly in kitchen cabinets.
features: 【Set of 8 Glass Storage Containers】Rectangle (35.1OZ)+(21.6OZ)+(12.5OZ)+(5OZ); Square (27.1OZ)+(17.6OZ)+(10.8OZ)+(6.8OZ); large and small containers are versatile for different use: meal prep food, leftover, sauce, lunch to go, RV, picnic, camping.

【Glass Containers Safe for Oven/ Microwave/ Freezer/ Dishwasher】Vtopmart Meal Prep Container is able to withstand -4℉ to 752℉ (-20℃ – 400℃), the glass containers is made of high-quality borosilicate glass to hold up very well from refrigerator direct to microwave.

【100% Leak Proof Airtight Lid】Glass food containers is designed with removable silicone seals and 4-hinge snap locks to ensure zero leaking or spilling, which also prevent smell go out and keep food fresh.

【BPA Free and Food Grade Material】The glass food containers is 100% BPA Free, crystal-clear glass making it easy to see what's inside. Stains-resistant material for easy cleaning and keep glass containers looks like new.
【Stackable Storage to Save Space】The durable food storage containers stack into each other for easier storing when you don’t use them, which fit neatly in kitchen cabinets.
